item.title: Airlines' wild 2024: From Boeing troubles to a bankruptcy and a merger
item.description: The U.S. airline industry had another busy year while strong demand buoyed stocks into the end of the year.

item.title: Larry Ellison wraps up banner year as Oracle's stock rallies most since dot-com boom
item.description: Oracle shares have jumped 63% in 2024 and are headed for their best year since 1999, adding more than $75 billion to Larry Ellison's net worth.

item.title: FDA raises recall alert on Costco eggs to highest level over risk of severe illness or death due to salmonella
item.description: Regulators warned that eating the eggs could bring "serious adverse health consequences or death.‚Äù

item.title: Trump names Kevin Marino Cabrera U.S. ambassador to Panama
item.description: The announcement comes days after Trump delivered a series of messages suggesting the U.S. should take control of the Panama Canal.

item.title: Waymo dominated U.S. robotaxi market in 2024, but Tesla and Amazon's Zoox loom
item.description: Waymo may have outlasted GM's Cruise to lead the U.S. market but Elon Musk's Tesla and Amazon's Zoox are working to catch up.
